import React from 'react'; import Topic from "./Topic" import { Grid, Paper } from '@material-ui/core'; import { makeStyles } from '@material-ui/core/styles'; const useStyles = makeStyles((theme) => ({ grid: { width: '100%', margin: '0px' }, paper: { padding: theme.spacing(2), textAlign: 'center', color: theme.palette.text.secondary, background: theme.palette.success.light, } })) export default function Topics() { const classes = useStyles(); return (
